text: People start to notice that even though you have been president for a while, America is still not 'great again'.

choices.text: I'm not a miracle worker! In fact, I am not even part of the working class.
Give an speech on how you know many people who do think that America is great again.

text: Your advisor mentions that bringing Apple's production back is a good way to create jobs. How are you going to convince Tim Cook?

choices.text: Who's Tim Cook? Isn't Steve Jobs running that place?
Plant some money in a field, and hope a factory will grow there.
Give Jim Took a seat on some advisory board.

text: It's time for you daily Twitter-moment. What are you going to tweet about this time?

choices.text: The many great things you have accomplished in the last five minutes.
Criticize a random country that probably does not even exist, but you've seen on Facebook

text: You've made a mental typo and accidentally added your BDSM safeword 'covfefe' to your tweet.

choices.text: Dammit. I should stop reading 50 Shades of Grey.

text: While looking at a picture of Kim-Jong Un, you suddenly see the resemblance between you two.

choices.text: I hate people copying another! Unless, of course, you're copying me, because that gives you individuality.
I do not know who that fat Dwarf is, but my nukes will.

text: While walking from your tennis court to the helicopter an old lady gives you a carrot.

choices.text: What is that savage doing here?
Eat the carrot.

text: You feel sleepy. After a small nap, you look in the mirror and see that your skin has turned orange!

choices.text: Lookin' good.

text: A feminist is complaining about equal rights again.

choices.text: Offer to deport both her and her husband.
Tell her that tumblr.com exists for a reason.
Ignore her.

text: The FBI is investigating your relationship with your best friend Vladdy.

choices.text: Fire the FBI director, nobody touches my Vladdy.
Let them be. The power of friendship defeats all.

text: While signing some very important papers, Despacito is on the radio, again.

choices.text: Like a reasonable human being, turn off the radio.
File an executive order that states that Despacito is banned from now on.

text: Russia is becoming a bigger and bigger threat to national security!

choices.text: Don't worry! I'm on good terms with my boy Putin!
We need to increase military spending.

text: A reporter ask you about your opinion on Net Neutrality.

choices.text: I have no clue what you're talking about, but I am never neutral.
Very important! I keep saying that it's very import, because it is.

text: It's time for a unreasonable executive order!

choices.text: Ban Kinder Eggs
Force every city to have a statue of me!

text: You cannot ban something that is already banned, you silly man.

choices.text: Right.

text: You finally have your first meeting with Angela Merkel, exciting!

choices.text: Show how strong Daddy Donald is, and pull her in while shaking hands.
Make some kind of trade deal, which you think earns you money in exchange for some things.

text: Some stupid Dutch person made a sarcastic video about how great The Netherlands is while imitating your voice.

choices.text: Make a video about how great America is while imitating his voice
Let it go, it probably won't go viral or anything...

text: It went viral.

choices.text: You've got to be kidding me.

text: Somebody made fun of TV on the small crowd at your inauguration speech, again.

choices.text: It's almost as if The Daily Show doesn't have anything better to do.

text: Mr. President, Li Keqiang is waiting in the lobby.

choices.text: Ah, finally, the Chinese delivery guy!
Let him in, we need to make some trade deals.
Not now, I'm watching The Great British Bake Off.

text: Not quite Mr President, he is the Premier of China.

choices.text: Sounds important, send him in.
Still don't know him, deport him please.

text: That stupid whore that you had an affair with threatens to go public with it unless you give her money.

choices.text: You know what you have to do.
Pay the money.
Which one?

text: You deported here. Like you always do. Good job.

choices.text: I love myself.

text: The investigation into Hillary Clinton finally paid off!

choices.text: It's a bit late for that now is it?
Let's kick her while she's down!

text: Some reporter did a deep background check, and found out that you are filthy rich thanks to your father's loans.

choice.text: Bribe him with your father's money.
